
git fetch
git merge origin/master

从远处获取最新的版本到本地的tmp分支上
之后再进行比较合并
git fetch origin master:tmp
git diff tmp
git merge tmp
git branch -d tmp


相当于从远程获取最新版本并merge到本地
git pull

= 删除远程分支 =
git push origin --delete <branchName>

= 删除远程tag =
git push origin --delete tag <tagname>

= 版本发布 =
git push origin v2.1
